short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows details of an Ethereum account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ethereum Account Explorer is a tool for viewing detailed information about any Ethereum account. Simply enter an Ethereum address, and the extension will fetch and display the following information:

Account Balance: Shows the current balance in Ether.
Transaction Count: Displays the total number of transactions sent from the account.
Latest Transactions: Lists the most recent transactions including transaction hash, sender and recipient addresses, value in Ether, and timestamp.
This extension is perfect for Ethereum enthusiasts, developers, and anyone looking to keep track of Ethereum accounts in a simple and efficient manner. All data is fetched securely using the Etherscan API.
